page.shortlink: ux list properties detail view table store data for which operations property
page.topic: Store data for which operation types
page.description: Specify if the current location information should be stored only when inserting a new record or when inserting or updating a record.

item.name: InsertOnly
item.description: Current location information should be stored only wen inserting a new record.

item.name: InsertAndUpdate
item.description: Current location information should be stored when a record is inserted or updated.
